thread.title: Donald Trump picked a heck of a day to finally hold a press conference
thread.title_full: Donald Trump picked a heck of a day to finally hold a press conference

author: rss@dailykos.com (Laura Clawson)
title: Donald Trump picked a heck of a day to finally hold a press conference
text:
11 
Donald Trump hasn’t held a press conference since July 2016, and when it comes to scheduling a post-election presser, he’s repeatedly moved the goalposts. His team finally settled on having one on Jan. 11 to coincide with a barrage of major confirmation hearings—only to have Jan. 11 turn out to be the day after bombshell reports that Russia has “compromising information” on Trump, and that someone on his team was in contact with Russia during the campaign. 
The focus of this press conference was supposed to be what Trump is (or, in reality, isn’t) doing to separate himself from his business and avoid conflicts of interest. He should still face questions about that—serious ones—but he’s unlikely to get the grilling the subject merits, given Tuesday’s news.
